mapper.select: SELECT posting_no ,co_name ,work_region ,end_date ,emp_type ,posting_title ,file_path FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM r , p.posting_no , sq.co_name , p.work_region , p.end_date , p.emp_type , p.posting_title , sq.file_path FROM posting p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM company_user c JOIN files f ON c.co_user_no = f.domain_id WHERE f.domain_type = 'COMPANY' ) sq ON p.co_user_no = sq.co_user_no WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) WHERE r > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount} ORDER BY posting_no DESC
